about_the_game:
This scenario pack features services on the Chatham Main Line based on real-life 2019 and 2023-2024 timetables. The majority of services are based upon real life passenger services in peak or off-peak times, as well as weekend engineering works and rare empty-stock moves, including a Class 395 travelling between Dover and Faversham.

Within the pack there are 4 scenarios for the Class 375 (various subclasses), 2 scenarios for the Class 465, 2 Scenarios for the Class 700 and 2 scenarios for the Class 395. All scenarios are career scenarios and will have a final score of 1,000 or a starting score of 1,000 for Empty Stock Movement scenarios (Scenarios 5 and 8).

Included Scenarios


A selection of engaging Career scenarios are included:

  • 2.1 [BMS-01] Class 375/7 - 1S18 0810 London Victoria to Dover Priory
  • 2.2 [BMS-02] Class 465/9 - 2K60 0700 Sheerness on Sea to London Victoria
  • 2.3 [BMS-03] Class 375/6 - 2U18 1003 Rainham (Kent) to Dover Priory
  • 2.4 [BMS-04] Class 375/3 - 2D55 / 2D56 1753 Sittingbourne to Sheerness-on-Sea to Sittingbourne
  • 2.5 [BMS-05] Class 395 - 5U10 / 5U11 - 0835 Dover Priory to Faversham to Ashford
  • 2.6 [BMS-06] Class 465/1 - 1S12 0840 London Victoria to Sole Street
  • 2.7 [BMS-07] Class 395 - 1J45 1449 Margate to St Pancras International
  • 2.8 [BMS-08] Class 375/3 5U20 0938 Sittingbourne to Ramsgate E.M.U.D.
  • 2.9 [BMS-09] Class 700/0 - 9K51 1741 Kentish Town to Orpington
  • 2.10 [BMS-10] Class 700/0 - 9V12 0616 Sutton (Surrey) to St Albans

Please Note: The following add-ons are required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on:

  • Chatham Main Line: London Victoria & Blackfriars - Dover & Ramsgate Route
  • Class 375 Southeastern Additional Livery Pack (included with above)
  • Class 700 Thameslink (Not required for all scenarios)

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!
detailed_description:
This scenario pack features services on the Chatham Main Line based on real-life 2019 and 2023-2024 timetables. The majority of services are based upon real life passenger services in peak or off-peak times, as well as weekend engineering works and rare empty-stock moves, including a Class 395 travelling between Dover and Faversham.

Within the pack there are 4 scenarios for the Class 375 (various subclasses), 2 scenarios for the Class 465, 2 Scenarios for the Class 700 and 2 scenarios for the Class 395. All scenarios are career scenarios and will have a final score of 1,000 or a starting score of 1,000 for Empty Stock Movement scenarios (Scenarios 5 and 8).

Included Scenarios


A selection of engaging Career scenarios are included:

  • 2.1 [BMS-01] Class 375/7 - 1S18 0810 London Victoria to Dover Priory
  • 2.2 [BMS-02] Class 465/9 - 2K60 0700 Sheerness on Sea to London Victoria

  • 2.4 [BMS-04] Class 375/3 - 2D55 / 2D56 1753 Sittingbourne to Sheerness-on-Sea to Sittingbourne
  • 2.5 [BMS-05] Class 395 - 5U10 / 5U11 - 0835 Dover Priory to Faversham to Ashford
  • 2.6 [BMS-06] Class 465/1 - 1S12 0840 London Victoria to Sole Street
  • 2.7 [BMS-07] Class 395 - 1J45 1449 Margate to St Pancras International
  • 2.8 [BMS-08] Class 375/3 5U20 0938 Sittingbourne to Ramsgate E.M.U.D.
  • 2.9 [BMS-09] Class 700/0 - 9K51 1741 Kentish Town to Orpington
  • 2.10 [BMS-10] Class 700/0 - 9V12 0616 Sutton (Surrey) to St Albans

Please Note: The following add-ons are required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on:

  • Chatham Main Line: London Victoria & Blackfriars - Dover & Ramsgate Route
  • Class 375 Southeastern Additional Livery Pack (included with above)

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please re
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
